description: Explore the evolution of NFTs and their transformative impact on digital ownership, from the inception of blockchain technology to their present-day prominence in art, gaming, and beyond. This journey uncovers key milestones, including the origins, rise to mainstream prominence, and future potential of non-fungible tokens.
keywords: NFTs, digital ownership, blockchain, Ethereum, CryptoPunks, CryptoKitties, art, digital assets, ERC-721, ERC-1155, Beeple, environmental impact, proof-of-stake, real estate, gaming
title: The Evolution of NFTs: A Journey Through Digital Ownership
